mapper.select: SELECT src.src_id srcId, src.src_title srcTitle, src.src_writer srcWriter, src.src_likecnt srcLikecnt, src.src_viewcnt srcViewcnt, src.src_path srcPath, user.user_name srcWriterName from tbl_src src, tbl_user user where src.src_status = 1 and src.src_writer = user.user_id ORDER BY src.src_likecnt DESC
